import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupitem, Button, ListGroupItem} from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const handleChange = e=>{}; return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ?null : avgRating} ({reviews ?.length})
{/*===========booking form===========*/}
Information
{/*===========booking end===========*/} {/*===========booking bottom===========*/}
${price}1 person
${price}

$10
Total
$109
) } export default Booking
